Headline: #172 U. of Chicago/Kenwood Temporary Northbound Reroute near 53rd/Woodlawn
ShortDescription: 172 U. of Chicago/Kenwood buses are temporarily rerouted via Woodlawn, 55th, University, 53rd and Woodlawn due to, street blockage near 53rd/Woodlawn.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Northbound #172 U. of Chicago/Kenwood buses are temporarily rerouted via Woodlawn, 55th, University, 53rd and Woodlawn due to, street blockage near 53rd/Woodlawn.

Southbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
